file.name: rally5-matching-system-openapi.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.3

info:
  title: The Maryland Test Facility Matching System Interface
  description: Application Programming Interface for receiving matching system requests from the MdTF Backend.
  version: 1.1.1
  contact:
    name: The MdTF
    url: https://mdtf.org
    email: rally@mdtf.org
  license:
    name: Copyright (c) 2022, The Maryland Test Facility

servers:
  - url: http://localhost:8080/

tags:
  - name: Biometric Operations
  - name: Algorithm Information

components:

  schemas:

    Image:
      type: object
      description: |
        Data transfer object for an image.
      properties:
        ImageData:
          type: string
          description: The captured image data in PNG format, encoded as a base64 string.
          example: iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAIAAACQd1PeAAAAEElEQVR4nGJiYGAABAAA//8ADAADcZGLFwAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==
          x-nullable: false
      required:
        - ImageData

    Template:
      type: object
      description: |
        Data transfer object for a template.
      properties:
        Template:
          description: The template data, encoded as a base64 string.  The data string shall not exceed 1 MB.
          type: string
          example: dGhpcyBzZW50ZW5jZSBpcyBhbiBleGFtcGxlIHRlbXBsYXRlLi4K
          x-nullable: false
      required:
        - Template

    Comparison:
      type: object
      description: |
        A similarity score for a single (1:1) template comparison operation.
      properties:
        Score:
          type: number
          format: float
          description: A similarity score, as produced by the algorithm
          example: 8734
          x-nullable: false
      required:
        - Score

    CompareListRequest:
      description: A single probe template object and a list of target templates that it will be compared to.
      type: object
      properties:
        ProbeTemplate:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Template'
        TargetTemplateList:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Template'
          x-nullable: false
      required:
        - ProbeTemplate
        - TargetTemplateList

    Info:
      type: object
      description: Basic information describing the algorithm.
      properties:
        AlgorithmName:
          type: string
          description: Name of algorithm
          example: AlwaysTrue
        AlgorithmVersion:
          type: string
          description: Algorithm version identifier
          example: 1.0.1
        AlgorithmModality:
          type: string
          enum:
            - Face
            - Finger
            - Iris
          description: A string enum describing the type of biometric images the algorithm is meant to process
        CompanyName:
          type: string
          description: Name of the Company which produced the algorithm
          example: MdTF
        TechnicalContactEmail:
          type: string
          description: |
            The email address of an engineer or other technical resource to contact in the event of
            an error running your service.
          example: john@mdtf.org
        RecommendedCPUs:
          type: number
          format: float
          description: The recommended allocation of CPUs for the deployed docker container.
          example: .5
          maximum: 8
        RecommendedMem:
          type: integer
          description: The recommended allocation of memory (MB) for the deployed docker container.
          example: 512
          maximum: 8192
        Test:
          description: A string enum describing which collection event the algorithm is being submitted for
          type: string
          enum:
            - MDTF_2022_RALLY
        Thresholds:
          description: |
            A map of preset False Match Rates (FMR) to vendor-provided threshold values. Score values returned from calls to
            v1/compare-list indicate a matching determination by the algorithm if they are greater than the provided threshold
            value at the respective FMR.
            Note that threshold values are floats stored as strings and cannot exceed a length of 10 characters.
            There are 5 required thresholds.
          maxProperties: 5
          type: object
          properties:
            1:500:
              type: string
              maxLength: 10
            1:1e3:
              type: string
              maxLength: 10
            1:1e4:
              type: string
              maxLength: 10
            1:1e5:
              type: string
              maxLength: 10
            1:1e6:
              type: string
              maxLength: 10
          required:
            - 1:500
            - 1:1e3
            - 1:1e4
            - 1:1e5
            - 1:1e6
          example:
            1:500: '7543'
            1:1e3: '8730'
            1:1e4: '9321'
            1:1e5: '9863'
            1:1e6: '9972'
      required:
        - AlgorithmName
        - AlgorithmVersion
        - AlgorithmModality
        - CompanyName
        - TechnicalContactEmail
        - RecommendedCPUs
        - RecommendedMem
        - Test
        - Thresholds

    RequestError:
      type: string
      description: |
        Relevant and concise diagnostic information in the event of a client side error (e.g. malformed requests, or invalid
        image encoding).
      example: Unable to decode image data as a PNG.

    ServerError:
      type: string
      description: |
        Relevant and concise diagnostic information in the event of a server side error
        (e.g. invalid license, or failure to generate a template).
      example: The internal license has expired.

  requestBodies:
    image:
      description: |
        The biometric image that is being submitted for feature extraction.
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Image'

    compare_list_request:
      description: A single template object and a list of templates that it will be compared to.
      required: true
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/CompareListRequest'

  responses:

    infoResponse:
      description: info response object
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Info'

    templateResponse:
      description: Successful Response
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Template'

    compareListResponse:
      description: Successful Response
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            type: array
            description: |
              An array of comparison results. This list MUST contain the same number of elements AND be in
              the same order as the provided list of templates.
            items:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Comparison'

    BadRequest:
      description: Bad Request
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/RequestError'

    InternalServerError:
      description: Internal Server Error
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ServerError'

paths:

  /v1/create-template:
    post:
      summary: Generate a template from the provided biometric image
      description: |
        This endpoint accepts a base64 encoded PNG and attempts to perform a feature extraction operation producing a
        single template.
      tags:
        - Biometric Operations
      operationId: GenerateTemplate
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/image'
      responses:
        200:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/templateResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'

  /v1/compare-list:
    post:
      summary: Compare a single probe template to a list of target templates
      description: |
        This endpoint accepts a template and a list of templates. It compares the probe template to every target template in the
        provided list. The result is a list of Comparison objects that holds a similarity score for each comparison. 
        The returned comparison list MUST contain the same number of elements AND be in the same order as the provided list
        of templates.
      tags:
        - Biometric Operations
      operationId: CompareTemplateList
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/compare_list_request'
      responses:
        200:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/compareListResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'

  /v1/info:
    get:
      summary: Returns basic information for the algorithm.
      description: |
        This endpoint returns some basic information about the algorithm.
      tags:
        - Algorithm Information
      operationId: GetInfo
      responses:
        200:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/infoResponse'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
